name: itstool
desc:
Itstool itstool extracts messages from XML files and outputs PO 
template files, then merges translations from MO files to create 
translated XML files. 
It determines what to translate and how to chunk it into messages using 
the W3C Internationalization Tag Set (ITS).

This package is known to build using an LFS 7.0 
platform but has not been tested.
